Features

These features in our simulator will get you more engaged in learning process and increase learning speed

01

Chat simulation
02

Email simulation
03

Learn on-the-go
04

Plain text view
05

Videos for hard-skills
06

Offline posters

Chat simulation

Most of the learning will be located in our chat-simulator, where you will receive hard and soft skills in an interactive format. Why is it done that way? It makes the education process much more interactive and immersive for our students.

Messengers became our default environment where we spend an enormous amount of time per day. This environment is familiar to us and makes learning feel like a normal life, which leads to easier information perception.

Email view

Throughout the simulator, you will receive email-like messages, where characters will send you assignments and introduce you to different parts of the story. It helps to connect different parts of the story into one continuous adventure.

Fully responsive

We understand the importance of on-the-go learning in today's world. That is why we have made our simulator fully responsive to any of your devices. Mobile, desktop, iPad, Tamagotchi (maybe not that). Learn anywhere, anytime.

Plain information view

In order to introduce you to different simulator parts and theory pieces, we have a view, where you will be concentrated on a text. We have specially divided educational into different views to make information digestion better. You will have triggers in your brain, that one view is responsible for one type of information, one for another.

Learn tools in video format

In the course, you will be learning about such tools as Miro, Invision, Figma. We have tested different formats, and video is winning for the hard-skills. That is why you will receive software reviews and tutorials in professionally crafted video tutorials.

Online to offline with posters

In order to connect the online simulator experience to offline - we have included different posters, that will help you memorise the learned materials. Additionally, they will just look cool on your walls
